anya-e0101n4:210_2: tena avatthābhedena panassā ayaṁ bhedo. Ekassāpi sato sattassa kumārayuvatherasenāpatirājādivasena
anya-e0101n4:210_3: bhedo viya. Tasmā tāsu yattha chaḷaṅgupekkhā, na tattha bojjhaṅgupekkhādayo. Yattha
anya-e0101n4:210_4: vā pana bojjhaṅgupekkhā, na tattha chaḷaṅgupekkhādayo hontīti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n4:211_0: Yathā cetāsamatthato ekībhāvo, evaṁ saṅkhārupekkhā vipassanupekkhānampi. Paññā eva
anya-e0101n4:211_1: hi sā kiccavasena dvidhā bhinnā. Yathā hi purisassa sāyaṁ gehaṁ paviṭṭhaṁ sappaṁ
anya-e0101n4:211_2: ajapadadaṇḍaṁ gahetvā pariyesamānassa taṁ thusakoṭṭhake nipannaṁ disvā “sappo nu
anya-e0101n4:211_3: kho, no”ti avalokentassa sovattikattayaṁ disvā nibbematikassa “sappo, na sappo”ti
anya-e0101n4:211_4: vicinane majjhattatā hoti, evameva yā āraddhavipassakassa vipassanāñāṇena lakkhaṇattaye
anya-e0101n4:211_5: diṭṭhe saṅkhārānaṁ aniccabhāvādivicinane majjhattatā uppajjati, ayaṁ vipassanupekkhā
anya-e0101n4:211_6: nāma. Yathā pana tassa purisassa ajapadadaṇḍena gāḷhaṁ sappaṁ gahetvā “kiṁ tāhaṁ
anya-e0101n4:211_7: imaṁ sappaṁ aviheṭhento attānañca iminā aḍaṁsāpento muñceyya”nti muñcanākārameva
anya-e0101n4:211_8: pariyesato gahaṇe majjhattatā hoti. Evameva yā lakkhaṇattayassa diṭṭhattā āditte
anya-e0101n4:211_9: viya tayo bhave passato saṅkhāraggahaṇe majjhattatā, ayaṁ saṅkhārupekkhā nāma. Iti
anya-e0101n4:211_10: vipassanupekkhāya siddhāya saṅkhārupekkhāpi siddhāva hoti. Iminā panesā vicinanaggahaṇesu
anya-e0101n4:211_11: majjhattasaṅkhātena kiccena dvidhā bhinnāti. Vīriyupekkhā pana vedanupekkhā ca aññamaññañca
anya-e0101n4:212_0: Iti imāsu upekkhāsu jhānupekkhā idhādhippetā. Sā majjhattalakkhaṇā, anābhogarasā,
anya-e0101n4:212_1: abyāpārapaccupaṭṭhānā, pītivirāgapadaṭṭhānāti. Etthāha, nanu cāyamatthato tatramajjhattupekkhāva
anya-e0101n4:212_2: hoti, sā ca paṭhamadutiyajjhānesupi atthi. Tasmā tatrāpi upekkhako ca viharatīti
anya-e0101n4:212_3: evamayaṁ vattabbā siyā, sā kasmā na vuttāti. Aparibyattakiccato. Aparibyattañhi tassā
anya-e0101n4:212_4: tattha kiccaṁ vitakkādīhi abhibhūtattā. Idha panāyaṁ vitakkavicārapītīhi anabhibhūtattā
anya-e0101n4:212_5: ukkhittasirā viya hutvā paribyattakiccā jātā, tasmā vuttāti.
anya-e0101n4:215_0: 85. Idāni sato ca sampajānoti ettha saratīti sato. Sampajānātīti sampajāno. Puggalena
anya-e0101n4:215_1: sati ca sampajaññañca vuttaṁ. Tattha saraṇalakkhaṇā sati, asammussanarasā, ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0101n4:216_0: Tattha kiñcāpi idaṁ satisampajaññaṁ purimajjhānesupi atthi. Muṭṭhasatissa hi asampajānassa
anya-e0101n4:216_1: upacāramattampi na sampajjati, pageva appanā. Oḷārikattā pana tesaṁ jhānānaṁ bhūmiyaṁ
anya-e0101n4:216_2: viya purisassa cittassa gati sukhā hoti, abyattaṁ tattha satisampajaññakiccaṁ. Oḷārikaṅgappahānena
anya-e0101n4:216_3: pana sukhumattā imassa jhānassa purisassa khuradhārāyaṁ viya satisampajaññakiccapariggahitā
anya-e0101n4:216_4: eva cittassa gati icchitabbāti idheva vuttaṁ. Kiñca bhiyyo, yathā dhenupago vaccho
anya-e0101n4:216_5: dhenuto apanīto arakkhiyamāno punadeva dhenuṁ upagacchati, evamidaṁ tatiyajjhānasukhaṁ
anya-e0101n4:216_6: pītito apanītaṁ, taṁ satisampajaññārakkhena arakkhiyamānaṁ punadeva pītiṁ upagaccheyya,
anya-e0101n4:216_7: pītisampayuttameva siyā. Sukhe vāpi sattā sārajjanti, idañca atimadhuraṁ sukhaṁ,
anya-e0101n4:216_8: tato paraṁ sukhābhāvā. Satisampajaññānubhāvena panettha sukhe asārajjanā hoti, no
anya-e0101n4:216_9: aññathāti imampi atthavisesaṁ dassetuṁ idamidheva vuttanti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0101n4:217_0: Idāni sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṁvedetīti ettha kiñcāpi tatiyajjhānasamaṅgino sukhapaṭisaṁvedanābhogo
anya-e0101n4:217_1: natthi. Evaṁ santepi yasmā tassa nāmakāyena sampayuttaṁ sukhaṁ. Yaṁ vā taṁ nāmakāyasampayuttaṁ
anya-e0101n4:217_2: sukhaṁ, taṁsamuṭṭhānenassa yasmā atipaṇītena rūpena rūpakāyo phuṭo, yassa phuṭattā
anya-e0101n4:217_3: jhānā vuṭṭhitopi sukhaṁ paṭisaṁvedeyya. Tasmā etamatthaṁ dassento sukhañca kāyena
anya-e0101n4:218_0: 86. Idāni yaṁ taṁ ariyā ācikkhanti upekkhako satimā sukhavihārīti ettha yaṁjhānahetu
anya-e0101n4:218_1: yaṁjhānakāraṇā taṁ tatiyajjhānasamaṅgipuggalaṁ buddhādayo ariyā ācikkhanti desenti
anya-e0101n4:218_2: paññapenti paṭṭhapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttānīkaronti pakāsenti, pasaṁsantīti
anya-e0101n4:218_3: adhippāyo. Kinti? Upekkhako satimā sukhavihārīti. Taṁ tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja
anya-e0101n4:219_0: Kasmā pana taṁ te evaṁ pasaṁsantīti? Pasaṁsārahato. Ayañhi yasmā atimadhurasukhe
anya-e0101n4:219_1: sukhapāramippattepi tatiyajjhāne upekkhako, na tattha sukhābhisaṅgena ākaḍḍhiyati.
anya-e0101n4:219_2: Yathā ca pīti na uppajjati, evaṁ upaṭṭhitasatitāya satimā. Yasmā ca ariyakantaṁ ariyajanasevitameva
anya-e0101n4:219_3: ca asaṁkiliṭṭhaṁ sukhaṁ nāmakāyena paṭisaṁvedeti, tasmā pasaṁsāraho hoti. Iti pasaṁsārahato
anya-e0101n4:219_4: naṁ ariyā te evaṁ pasaṁsāhetubhūte guṇe pakāsento “upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī”ti
anya-e0101n4:220_0: Tatiyanti gaṇanānupubbatā tatiyaṁ, idaṁ tatiyaṁ samāpajjatītipi tatiyaṁ. Yaṁ pana
anya-e0101n4:220_1: vuttaṁ “ekaṅgavippahīnaṁ duvaṅgasamannāgata”nti, ettha pītiyā pahānavasena ekaṅgavippahīnatā
anya-e0101n4:220_2: veditabbā. Sā panesā dutiyajjhānassa vitakkavicārā viya appanākkhaṇeyeva pahīyati.
anya-e0101n4:220_3: Tena nassa sā pahānaṅganti vuccati. Sukhaṁ cittekaggatāti imesaṁ pana dvinnaṁ uppattivasena
anya-e0101n4:220_4: duvaṅgasamannāgatatā veditabbā. Tasmā yaṁ vibhaṅge “jhānanti upekkhā sati sampajaññaṁ
anya-e0101n4:220_5: sukhaṁ cittassekaggatā”ti vuttaṁ, taṁ saparikkhāraṁ jhānaṁ dassetuṁ pariyāyena vuttaṁ.
anya-e0101n4:220_7: aṅgānaṁ vasena duvaṅgikamevetaṁ hoti. Yathāha – “katamaṁ tasmiṁ samaye duvaṅgikaṁ
anya-e0101n4:220_8: jhānaṁ hoti, sukhaṁ cittassekaggatā”ti. Sesaṁ paṭhamajjhāne vuttanayameva.
anya-e0101n4:222_0: 87. Evamadhigate pana tasmiṁpi vuttanayeneva pañcahākārehi ciṇṇavasinā hutvā paguṇatatiyajjhānato
anya-e0101n4:222_1: vuṭṭhāya “ayaṁ samāpatti āsannapītipaccatthikā, ‘yadeva tattha sukhamiti cetaso ābhogo,
anya-e0101n4:222_2: etenetaṁ oḷārikaṁ akkhāyatī’ti evaṁ vuttassa sukhassa oḷārikattā aṅgadubbalā”ti ca
anya-e0101n4:222_3: tattha dosaṁ disvā catutthaṁ jhānaṁ santato manasikatvā tatiyajjhāne nikantiṁ pariyādāya
anya-e0101n4:222_4: catutthādhigamāya yogo kātabbo. Athassa yadā tatiyajjhānato vuṭṭhāya satassa sampajānassa
anya-e0101n4:222_5: jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhato cetasikasomanassasaṅkhātaṁ sukhaṁ oḷārikato upaṭṭhāti, upekkhāvedanā
anya-e0101n4:222_6: ceva cittekaggatā ca santato upaṭṭhāti, tadāssa oḷārikaṅgappahānāya santaaṅgapaṭilābhāya
anya-e0101n4:222_7: ca tadeva nimittaṁ “pathavī pathavī”ti punappunaṁ manasikaroto “idāni catutthaṁ jhānaṁ
anya-e0101n4:222_8: uppajjissatī”ti bhavaṅgaṁ upacchinditvā tadeva pathavīkasiṇaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṁ
anya-e0101n4:222_9: uppajjati. Tato tasmiṁyevārammaṇe cattāri pañca vā javanāni uppajjanti, yesaṁ avasāne
anya-e0101n4:222_10: ekaṁ rūpāvacaraṁ catutthajjhānikaṁ, sesāni vuttappakārāneva kāmāvacarāni. Ayaṁ pana
anya-e0101n4:222_11: viseso, yasmā sukhavedanā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya āsevanapaccayena paccayo na hoti,
anya-e0101n4:222_12: catutthajjhāne ca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya uppajjitabbaṁ, tasmā tāni upekkhāvedanāsampayuttāni
anya-e0101n4:222_13: honti. Upekkhāsampayuttattāyeva cettha pītipi parihāyatīti. Ettāvatā cesa sukhassa
anya-e0101n4:222_14: ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ
anya-e0101n4:222_15: upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati. Evamanena ekaṅgavippahīnaṁ
anya-e0101n4:222_16: duvaṅgasamannāgataṁ tividhakalyāṇaṁ dasalakkhaṇasampannaṁ catutthaṁ jhānaṁ adhigataṁ
anya-e0101n4:223_0: 88. Tattha sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānāti kāyikasukhassa ca kāyikadukkhassa
anya-e0101n4:223_1: ca pahānā. Pubbevāti tañca kho pubbeva, na catutthajjhānakkhaṇe. Somanassadomanassānaṁ
anya-e0101n4:223_2: atthaṅgamāti cetasikasukhassa ca cetasikadukkhassa cāti imesampi dvinnaṁ pubbeva
anya-e0101n4:224_0: Kadā pana nesaṁ pahānaṁ hotīti. Catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ upacārakkhaṇe. Somanassañhi catutthajjhānassa
anya-e0101n4:224_2: Evametesaṁ pahānakkamena avuttānampi indriyavibhaṅge pana indriyānaṁ uddesakkameneva
anya-e0101n4:225_0: Yadi panetāni tassa tassa jhānassa upacārakkhaṇeyeva pahīyanti, atha kasmā “kattha
anya-e0101n4:225_1: cuppannaṁ dukkhindriyaṁ aparisesaṁ nirujjhati, idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva
anya-e0101n4:225_2: kāmehipi…pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati. Ettha cuppannaṁ dukkhindriyaṁ
anya-e0101n4:225_3: aparisesaṁ nirujjhati. Kattha cuppannaṁ domanassindriyaṁ sukhindriyaṁ somanassindriyaṁ
anya-e0101n4:225_4: aparisesaṁ nirujjhati, idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā…pe… catutthaṁ
anya-e0101n4:225_5: jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati, ettha cuppannaṁ somanassindriyaṁ aparisesaṁ nirujjhatī”ti
anya-e0101n4:225_6: evaṁ jhānesveva nirodho vuttoti? Atisayanirodhattā. Atisayanirodho hi nesaṁ paṭhamajjhānādīsu,
anya-e0101n4:225_7: na nirodhoyeva. Nirodhoyeva pana upacārakkhaṇe, nātisayanirodho.
anya-e0101n4:226_0: Tathā hi nānāvajjane paṭhamajjhānupacāre niruddhassāpi dukkhindriyassa ḍaṁsamakasādisamphassena
anya-e0101n4:226_1: vā visamāsanupatāpena vā siyā uppatti, na tveva antoappanāyaṁ. Upacāre vā niruddhampetaṁ
anya-e0101n4:226_2: na suṭṭhu niruddhaṁ hoti, paṭipakkhena avihatattā. Antoappanāyaṁ pana pītipharaṇena
anya-e0101n4:226_3: sabbo kāyo sukhokkanto hoti, sukhokkantakāyassa ca suṭṭhu niruddhaṁ hoti dukkhindriyaṁ,
anya-e0101n4:226_4: paṭipakkhena vihatattā. Nānāvajjaneyeva ca dutiyajjhānupacāre pahīnassa domanassindriyassa
anya-e0101n4:226_5: yasmā etaṁ vitakkavicārapaccayepi kāyakilamathe cittupaghāte ca sati uppajjati. Vitakkavicārābhāve
anya-e0101n4:226_6: ca neva uppajjati. Yattha pana uppajjati, tattha vitakkavicārabhāve, appahīnā eva
anya-e0101n4:226_7: ca dutiyajjhānupacāre vitakkavicārāti tatthassa siyā uppatti, na tveva dutiyajjhāne,
anya-e0101n4:226_8: pahīnapaccayattā. Tathā tatiyajjhānupacāre pahīnassāpi sukhindriyassa pītisamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭakāyassa
anya-e0101n4:226_9: siyā uppatti, na tveva tatiyajjhāne. Tatiyajjhāne hi sukhassa paccayabhūtā pīti sabbaso
anya-e0101n4:226_10: niruddhāti. Tathā catutthajjhānupacāre pahīnassāpi somanassindriyassa āsannattā appanāppattāya
anya-e0101n4:226_11: upekkhāya abhāvena sammā anatikkantattā ca siyā uppatti, na tveva catutthajjhāne.
anya-e0101n4:226_12: Tasmā eva ca etthuppannaṁ dukkhindriyaṁ aparisesaṁ nirujjhatīti tattha tattha aparisesaggahaṇaṁ katanti.
anya-e0101n4:227_0: Etthāha “athevaṁ tassa tassa jhānassupacāre pahīnāpi etā vedanā idha kasmā samāhaṭā”ti?
anya-e0101n4:227_1: Sukhaggahaṇatthaṁ. Yā hi ayaṁ adukkhamasukhanti ettha adukkhamasukhā vedanā vuttā,
anya-e0101n4:227_2: sā sukhumā duviññeyyā na sakkā sukhena gahetuṁ, tasmā yathā nāma duṭṭhassa yathā
anya-e0101n4:227_3: vā tathā vā upasaṅkamitvā gahetuṁ asakkuṇeyyassa goṇassa sukhaggahaṇatthaṁ gopo ekasmiṁ
anya-e0101n4:227_4: vaje sabbā gāvo samāharati, athekekaṁ nīharanto paṭipāṭiyā āgataṁ “ayaṁ so gaṇhatha
anya-e0101n4:227_5: na”nti tampi gāhayati, evameva bhagavā sukhaggahaṇatthaṁ sabbā etā samāhari. Evañhi
anya-e0101n4:227_6: samāhaṭā etā dassetvā yaṁ neva sukhaṁ na dukkhaṁ na somanassaṁ na domanassaṁ, ayaṁ
anya-e0101n4:227_7: adukkhamasukhā vedanāti sakkā hoti esā gāhayituṁ.
anya-e0101n4:228_0: Apica adukkhamasukhāya cetovimuttiyā paccayadassanatthañcāpi etā vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n4:228_1: Dukkhappahānādayo hi tassā paccayā. Yathāha – “cattāro kho, āvuso, paccayā adukkhamasukhāya
anya-e0101n4:228_2: cetovimuttiyā samāpattiyā. Idhāvuso, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā…pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ
anya-e0101n4:228_3: upasampajja viharati. Ime khvāvuso, cattāro paccayā adukkhamasukhāya cetovimuttiyā samāpattiyā”ti.
anya-e0101n4:229: Yathā vā aññattha pahīnāpi sakkāyadiṭṭhiādayo tatiyamaggassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṁ tattha pahīnāti vuttā, evaṁ vaṇṇabhaṇanatthampetassa jhānassetā idha vuttātipi veditabbā.
anya-e0101n4:230_0: Paccayaghātena vā ettha rāgadosānamatidūrabhāvaṁ dassetumpetā vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n4:230_1: Etāsu hi sukhaṁ somanassassa paccayo, somanassaṁ rāgassa. Dukkhaṁ domanassassa paccayo,
anya-e0101n4:230_2: domanassaṁ dosassa. Sukhādighātena cassa sappaccayā rāgadosā hatāti atidūre hontīti.
anya-e0101n4:231_0: Adukkhamasukhanti dukkhābhāvena adukkhaṁ. Sukhābhāvena asukhaṁ. Etenettha dukkhasukhapaṭipakkhabhūtaṁ
anya-e0101n4:231_1: tatiyavedanaṁ dīpeti, na dukkhasukhābhāvamattaṁ. Tatiyavedanā nāma adukkhamasukhā,
anya-e0101n4:231_2: upekkhātipi vuccati. Sā iṭṭhāniṭṭhaviparītānubhavanalakkhaṇā, majjhattarasā, avibhūtapaccupaṭṭhānā,
anya-e0101n4:232_0: 89.Upekkhāsatipārisuddhinti upekkhāya janitasatiyā pārisuddhiṁ. Imasmiñhi jhāne suparisuddhā
anya-e0101n4:232_1: sati, yā ca tassā satiyā pārisuddhi, sā upekkhāya katā, na aññena. Tasmā etaṁ “upekkhāsatipārisuddhi”nti
anya-e0101n4:232_2: vuccati. Vibhaṅgepi vuttaṁ “ayaṁ sati imāya upekkhāya visadā hoti parisuddhā pariyodātā.
anya-e0101n4:232_3: Tena vuccati upekkhāsatipārisuddhī”ti. Yāya ca upekkhāya ettha satiyā pārisuddhi
anya-e0101n4:232_4: hoti, sā atthato tatramajjhattatātiveditabbā. Na kevalañcettha tāya satiyeva parisuddhā,
anya-e0101n4:232_5: apica kho sabbepi sampayuttadhammā, satisīsena pana desanā vuttā.
anya-e0101n4:233_0: Tattha kiñcāpi ayaṁ upekkhā heṭṭhāpi tīsu jhānesu vijjati. Yathā pana divā sūriyappabhābhibhavā
anya-e0101n4:233_1: sommabhāvena ca attano upakārakattena vā sabhāgāya rattiyā alābhā divā vijjamānāpi
anya-e0101n4:233_2: candalekhā aparisuddhā hoti apariyodātā, evamayampi tatramajjhattupekkhācandalekhā
anya-e0101n4:233_4: vijjamānāpi paṭhamādijjhānabhedesu aparisuddhā hoti. Tassā ca aparisuddhāya divā
anya-e0101n4:233_5: aparisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi satiādayo aparisuddhāva honti. Tasmā
anya-e0101n4:233_6: tesu ekampi “upekkhāsatipārisuddhi”nti na vuttaṁ. Idha pana vitakkādipaccanīkadhammatejābhibhavābhāvā
anya-e0101n4:233_7: sabhāgāya ca upekkhāvedanārattiyā paṭilābhā ayaṁ tatramajjhattupekkhācandalekhā ativiya
anya-e0101n4:233_8: parisuddhā. Tassā parisuddhattā parisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi satiādayo
anya-e0101n4:233_9: parisuddhā honti pariyodātā. Tasmā idameva “upekkhāsatipārisuddhi”nti vuttanti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0101n4:234_0: Catutthanti gaṇanānupubbatā catutthaṁ. Idaṁ catutthaṁ samāpajjatītipi catutthaṁ.
anya-e0101n4:234_1: Yaṁ pana vuttaṁ “ekaṅgavippahīnaṁ duvaṅgasamannāgata”nti, tattha somanassassa pahānavasena
anya-e0101n4:234_2: ekaṅgavippahīnatā veditabbā. Tañca pana somanassaṁ ekavīthiyaṁ purimajavanesuyeva
anya-e0101n4:234_3: pahīyati. Tenassa taṁ pahānaṅganti vuccati. Upekkhāvedanā cittassekaggatāti imesaṁ
anya-e0101n4:234_4: pana dvinnaṁ uppattivasena duvaṅgasamannāgatatā veditabbā. Sesaṁ paṭhamajjhāne vuttanayameva.
anya-e0101n4:236_0: 90. Pañcakajjhānaṁ pana nibbattentena paguṇapaṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya “ayaṁ samāpatti
anya-e0101n4:236_1: āsannanīvaraṇapaccatthikā, vitakkassa oḷārikattā aṅgadubbalā”ti ca tattha dosaṁ disvā
anya-e0101n4:236_2: dutiyajjhānaṁ santato manasikaritvā paṭhamajjhāne nikantiṁ pariyādāya dutiyādhigamāya
anya-e0101n4:236_3: yogo kātabbo. Athassa yadā paṭhamajjhānā vuṭṭhāya satassa sampajānassa jhānaṅgāni
anya-e0101n4:236_4: paccavekkhato vitakkamattaṁ oḷārikato upaṭṭhāti, vicārādayo santato. Tadāssa oḷārikaṅgappahānāya
anya-e0101n4:236_5: santaṅgapaṭilābhāya ca tadeva nimittaṁ “pathavī pathavī”ti punappunaṁ manasikaroto
anya-e0101n4:236_6: vuttanayeneva dutiyajjhānaṁ uppajjati. Tassa vitakkamattameva pahānaṅgaṁ. Vicārādīni
anya-e0101n4:237_0: Evamadhigate pana tasmimpi vuttanayeneva pañcahākārehi ciṇṇavasinā hutvā paguṇadutiyajjhānato
anya-e0101n4:237_1: vuṭṭhāya “ayaṁ samāpatti āsannavitakkapaccatthikā, vicārassa oḷārikattā aṅgadubbalā”ti
anya-e0101n4:237_2: ca tattha dosaṁ disvā tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ santato manasikaritvā dutiyajjhāne nikantiṁ
anya-e0101n4:237_3: pariyādāya tatiyādhigamāya yogo kātabbo. Athassa yadā dutiyajjhānato vuṭṭhāya satassa
anya-e0101n4:237_4: sampajānassa jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhato vicāramattaṁ oḷārikato upaṭṭhāti, pītiādīni
anya-e0101n4:237_5: santato. Tadāssa oḷārikaṅgappahānāya santaṅgapaṭilābhāya ca tadeva nimittaṁ “pathavī
anya-e0101n4:237_6: pathavī”ti punappunaṁ manasikaroto vuttanayeneva tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ uppajjati. Tassa
anya-e0101n4:237_7: vicāramattameva pahānaṅgaṁ catukkanayassa dutiyajjhāne viya pītiādīni tīṇi samannāgataṅgāni.
anya-e0101n4:238: Iti yaṁ catukkanaye dutiyaṁ, taṁ dvidhā bhinditvā pañcakanaye dutiyañceva tatiyañca hoti. Yāni ca tattha tatiyacatutthāni, tāni ca catutthapañcamāni honti. Paṭhamaṁ paṭhamamevāti.
